name: Make love not war: A look into the achievements and disappointments of Austria under the Habsburg Empire
description: Those on the tour will receive a fun and educational look into the Habsburg Empire in Vienna. Through historical anecdotes and a small history lesson, famous individuals such as Sisi, Franz, Maria Theresia, and Joseph II will take on a life of their own. This is not a tour with simply dry historical facts but rather one that concentrates on who these people where, not only as rulers, but also as interesting personalities!
